resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The successive versions are layered on the same manuscript in the form of corrections, primarily additions, and occasional deletions. Unlike Flaubert and Balzac, Hugo doesn’t write successive versions in extenso and on different manuscript.
resource.chars: The successive versions are layered on the same manuscript in the form of corrections, primarily additions, and occasional deletions. Unlike Flaubert and Balzac, Hugo doesn’t write successive versions in extenso and on different manuscript.
